item.title: Docs: Script Kiddie Writeup
item.description:
Script Kiddie! What is the author (0xdf)implying to us?

A box for script kiddies? Or is it a box for us to stand out from the script kiddies? My guess would be the latter…

Always remember, the destination (root.txt) is not what’s important, it’s the journey (every line that got us to root.txt) that counts.

With that said, let’s begin!

Testing image

File download test

Another section

Should be Centered Should be Right Aligned
text text
